content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Ore Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5) and a Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0).
- Stone Furnace at position (-11.0, -48.0).
- Stone Furnace at position (-9.0, -48.0).
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5) used to transfer items to the Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0).

### Coal Processing Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0) connected to a Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5) and a Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0).
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5) used to transfer items to the Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0).

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors due to full chests
- Regularly check and empty chests to prevent mining drills from halting operations due to full chests. Specifically, ensure the chest at (41.5, -80.5) and (-14.5, -48.5) are emptied to continue mining.

### Errors due to furnaces lacking ingredients
- Ensure furnaces have the necessary ingredients to smelt. Regularly supply iron ore to the furnaces at (-13.0, -48.0) and (-11.0, -48.0) to prevent them from idling.
